title: Minimal Auto-Orchestration Command Logic
acceptance: Update .claude/commands/orchestrate.md with minimal logic to detect state and call other commands
Ensure /orchestrate knows WHEN to call /tasks-create, /status, /prd-init, etc.
Keep core command lightweight - delegate complex logic to specialized commands
Enable full auto operation without loading unnecessary context
Maintain separation of concerns: orchestrate = decision engine, other commands = action engines

2025-06-12T03:25:00Z: Task completed - minimal decision engine implemented
